sentences.en: A similar definition holds good for latent heat of vaporization.
sentences.cn: 气化潜热的定义与此雷同.

sentences.en: Distillation Vaporization of a liquid and subsequent condensation of the gas Back to liquid form.
sentences.cn: 把一种物质先转变成蒸气,再冷凝成液体的过程.

sentences.en: Distillation Vaporization of a liquid and subsequent condensation of the resultant gas Back to liquid form.
sentences.cn: 蒸馏:把一种物质先转变成蒸气,再冷凝成液体的过程.

sentences.en: On vaporization it reduces the bulk density of upflowing mixture and promotes the circulation of catalyst.
sentences.cn: 在汽化时使向上流动的混合物的松密度减少,并促使催化剂循环.

sentences.en: Reverse Cycle Type: pump body mounted directly on the motor flange for easy vaporization of liquid.
sentences.cn: 逆循环型: 泵体直接装在电机法兰上,适用于易汽化液体.

sentences.en: Since heat leak is always present, vaporization takes place continuously.
sentences.cn: 由于热泄露总是存在, 蒸发不断地发生.

sentences.en: The ambient temperature is closely related to the fuel vaporization and air mixture the cold start.
sentences.cn: 环境温度显著影响甲醇发动机冷起动时燃料蒸发速度和混合气浓度.

sentences.en: The atomization process is more sensitive to disturbance than vaporization.
sentences.cn: 雾化过程比汽化过程对扰动更为敏感.

sentences.en: The factors affecting the water vaporization were investigated.
sentences.cn: 研究了影响水分蒸发的各项因素.

sentences.en: The heat of condensation is equal to the heat of vaporization.
The high heat of vaporization also prevents water sources in the tropics from getting evaporated quickly.
sentences.cn: 很高的蒸发比热还可以防止赤道地区的水资源被很快地蒸发掉.

sentences.en: The oil is heated, and partial vaporization occurs.
sentences.cn: 原油被加热后, 部分汽化.

sentences.en: This design reduces heat leak and vaporization of liquid helium during transportation.
sentences.cn: 这种设计减小了运输过程中的热泄漏和液氦的蒸发.

sentences.en: Three factors affect ignition, fuel vaporization, sparkplug location and spark energy.
sentences.cn: 影响点火的因素有三个, 即燃油的蒸发 、 火花塞的位置和火花能量.

sentences.en: Utilizing boiler waste gas for vaporization and concentration of waste water, burning of offal, the method not only deal with waste water skillfully, but also depress boiler dust efficiently.
sentences.cn: 先用废烟气蒸发浓缩，再焚烧，既巧妙处理了废水，又降低了锅炉烟尘，是一种低成本、低耗能以废治废双达标的方。

sentences.en: Vaporization of the liquid level and pressure of the size of high and low temperatures.
sentences.cn: 液体的汽化程度与压力的大小、温度高低有关.

words.tran_cn: 似蒸气的；模糊的；忧郁病的
空想的；多蒸气的；雾状的
